thread.section_title: Hotel de Londres Eiffel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Fantastic 3 night stay!
thread.title_full: Fantastic 3 night stay! - Review of Hotel de Londres Eiffel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Karishma P
title: Fantastic 3 night stay!
text:
My boyfriend and I had a wonderful stay at this hotel. It has a unique homely feel and the staff were attentive and friendly. It's fantastic value for money with a great breakfast. Location is perfect for the metro for all the sight seeing and a 5 minute walk to the Eiffel Tower.
Extremely comfortable bed and we did not find the room to small as many other hotel reviews complain about.
I will definitely be recommending this hotel to my friends!
